text:
Fire Service Amendment Order 2021

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order under section 14(8) of the Fire Service Act 1979 .

29 November 2021

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

PETER GUTWEIN

Minister for Police, Fire and Emergency Management

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Fire Service Amendment Order 2021 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Act
    In this order, the Fire Service Act 1979 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Fire Service Act 1979 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 8 December 2021

This order is administered in the Department of Police, Fire and Emergency Management.
